alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Gadsden; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 04 at 9:44PM EDT until August 04 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT FOR WAKULLA...CENTRAL GADSDEN...SOUTHEASTERN LIBERTY...LEON AND NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 944 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Havana to 10 miles northwest of Carrabelle, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Carrabelle, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Quincy, Havana, St. Marks, Midway, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Jewel Fire Tower, Wakulla Springs, Florence, South City and Medart. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
